text: aur dehaatiyon mein kuchh aise bhee hain, jo allaah tatha antim din (pralay) par eemaan (vishvaas) rakhate hain aur apane diye hue daan ko allaah kee sameepta tatha rasool ke aasheervaadon ka saadhan samajhate hain. sun lo! ye vaastav mein, unake lie sameepy ka saadhan hai. sheeghr hee allaah unhen apanee daya mein pravesh dega, vaastav mein, allaah ati kshamaasheel, dayaavaan hai
